# Codex Agent Workspace

**External Agent**: Codex
**Purpose**: Parallel research and contributions to claude-code-sandbox
**Status**: Active

## ⚠️ Claude Code: Do Not Edit

This directory is managed by an external Codex agent. Claude Code running Claude Flow should not modify files here unless explicitly directed by the user.

## Contents

External agent research and contributions will be integrated into the main workspace only when the user explicitly requests synthesis.
